title: 44T of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) (as adapted
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency 

Act 2007 (Returns and Biofuel Levy) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited national oil reserve agency act 2007 (returns biofuel levy) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: 44T of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) (as adapted
heading: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 1 August 2020.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 1 August 2020.

title: 44T of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) (as adapted
heading: 3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Returns and Biofuel
text_raw:
3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Returns and Biofuel 

Levy) Regulations 2010 (S.I. 356 of 2010) are amended - 

(a) 

by the deletion of Regulation 4, 

and 

(b) 

by the substitution of the following Schedule for the 
Schedule: 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Regulation
text_norm: 3 national oil reserve agency act 2007 (returns biofuel levy) regulation 2010 (s.i 356 2010) amended - (a) deletion regulation 4 (b) substitution following schedule schedule notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 4th august 2020 regulation

title: 44T of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) (as adapted

heading: National Oil Reserves Agency

SCHEDULE FORM OF BIOFUEL LEVY ASSESSMENT 
NOTICE 

National Oil Reserves Agency 

An Ghníomhaireacht Chúltaca Ola Náisiúnta 

[insert address] 

Biofuel Levy Assessment Notice 

For the attention of: (insert name of biofuel obligation account 
holder) 

Biofuel levy assessment notice pursuant to section 44Q of the 
National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 for [insert month and 
year] 

Invoice number: 

Invoice date: 

Account number: 

Relevant disposals of 
road transport fuel 
for 

[insert month and year] 

Biofuel blended with 
motor spirit 

Biofuel blended with 
motor diesel (DERV) 

Other biofuel 

Amount Due 

Payment due date: 

Quantity 
(in litres) 

Rate of biofuel 
levy (€/litre) 

Total 
(€) 

€0.001 

€0.001 

€0.001 

[Insert details of bank account to which payment to be made] 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [279] 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 July 2020. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for Communications, Climate Action 

and Environment.
